formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: You can supply a text description for your reference only. Commander does not use this information.

formElement.label: URL:
formElement.documentation: The URL to use to connect to a Bugzilla server. For example: http://10.10.10.10:8080 or http://yourBugzillaserver

formElement.label: Product:
formElement.documentation: A unique product for this configuration.

formElement.label: Product Version:
formElement.documentation: Version of the product to use for this configuration. Default value is 'unspecified'.

formElement.label: Priority:
formElement.documentation: Priority for new bugs for this configuration. Default value is 'P4'.

formElement.label: Severity:
formElement.documentation: Severity for new bugs for this configuration. Default value is 'normal'.
